title: Destiny Reviews TFBlade And Pokimane "N-Word" | Zven Tilts PapaSmithy

embed.description: Your daily dose of LoL Twitch Moments Destiny discusses TfBlade's ban as well as pokimane not getting banned through her recent stream, PapaSmithy reviews TSM VS TL game, and many more!

replies.body: i like how twitch bans blade but didn't ban poki. gender equality at its finest XD its hilarious {{sticker:sg-miss-fortune}}
